content: ✨ ✨  AI AI everywhere - How do I evaluate my AI Agent? ✨ ✨ This involves Evaluation of 5 key areas: - Ecosystem Evaluation - Performance Evaluation - Accuracy & Effectiveness - Human-AI Interaction Quality - Real-World Testing & Continuous Learning Bonus: Use AI Evaluation PlatformsYou can also use tools like:MLflow, Weights & Biases (for model performance tracking)Rasa Test Stories (for conversational agents)Eval harnesses (OpenAI’s evals, LangChain’s benchmarks)hashtag#AI hashtag#Agent hashtag#ArtificialIntelligence hashtag#BOTs hashtag#Evaluation hashtag#AIFuture

comments.content: I rely on ChatGPT, Claude, and Perplexity almost every hour, these tools are essential to how I brainstorm ideas, plan my calendar, draft and refine messages, and rewrite emails. I’ve especially gotten into ChatGPT Projects for organizing workflows and using its deep research capabilities to dig into complex topics.

author.name: William Willis
author.title: Transformative Leader | Community Advocate & Speaker | Mentor & Coach | Board Member | AI & ML Strategist | Program, Process & Project Management Expert | Customer/Client Success Innovator | Business Strategist

comments.content: I rely on ChatGPT, Claude, and Perplexity almost every hour, these tools are essential to how I brainstorm ideas, plan my calendar, draft and refine messages, and rewrite emails. I’ve especially gotten into ChatGPT Projects for organizing workflows and using its deep research capabilities to dig into complex topics.

Too many teams rush to deploy agents without a solid evaluation framework—and that's where things start to break in production.At LLUMO AI, we take this a step further with Eval LM, designed specifically for real-time evaluation of agent behavior, output consistency, and interaction quality across workflows.Great to see tools like MLflow and LangChain Evals getting mentioned. The next leap? Tying evaluation directly to business outcomes—something we're seeing more enterprises demand.Appreciate this clear, actionable post.Checkout LLUMO AI Newsletter-Subscribe on LinkedIn https://www.linkedin.com/build-relation/newsletter-follow?entityUrn=7264618895892758528
